mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_rest ( t_r_idx, t_r_member, t_r_name, t_r_addr, t_r_menu, t_r_category ) VALUES ( seq_test_rest.NEXTVAL, #{t_r_member}, #{t_r_name}, #{t_r_addr}, #{t_r_menu, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{t_r_category} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM test_rest ORDER BY t_r_idx DESC

SELECT tr.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review v WHERE v.v_restaurant = tr.t_r_idx) as tr_v_count,
(SELECT AVG(v_score) FROM review v WHERE v.v_restaurant = tr.t_r_idx) as tr_avgscore FROM test_rest tr
t_r_category = #{t_r_category} AND t_r_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY t_r_avgscore DESC NULLS LAST, tr.t_r_idx DESC
